actions.committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: To provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp on the subject of inflammatory bowel disease.

summary.text: Directs the Postmaster General to issue a commemorative, first-class postage stamp on Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis, two chronic digestive diseases collectively known as inflammatory bowel disease.

titles.title: To provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp on the subject of inflammatory bowel disease.
